original_text: The Lord God helped these men with his power. Very many people believed their message and they trusted in the Lord Jesus.
korean_text: 주의 손이 그들과 함께 하시매 수많은 사람들이 믿고 주께 돌아오더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord God helped these men
Very many people believed their message
sentences.korean_translation: 매우 많은 사람들이 그들의 메시지를 믿었다

sentences.original_text: and they trusted in the Lord Jesus.
